CustomField.formula: CONTAINS(SBQQ__ProductCode__c, "CMVR") || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "HW-CM26-R" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "HW-CM25-S" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "HW-CM27-I" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "ACC-BPB" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "CBL-AG-AOPEN" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "CBL-VG-B1226" || NonGA_Service__c = TRUE || CONTAINS(SBQQ__ProductCode__c, "WIFI") || (CONTAINS(SBQQ__ProductCode__c, "HW-AG24") && ISBLANK(SBQQ__RequiredBy__c)) || (CONTAINS(SBQQ__ProductCode__c, "CBL-AG-ARTK"))|| SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "ACC-BPR" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = 'CBL-VG-BIZU' || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = 'CM52 Multicam-BUNDLE' || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = 'IG1-BUNDLE' || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "ACC-CM-ANLG" || SBQQ__ProductCode__c = "LIC-CM-ANLG" || CONTAINS(SBQQ__ProductCode__c, "VG54")
CustomField.label: ProductApproval
